articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The international preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated with due ceremony in Jakarta, Indonesia on Oct. 6. It was co-sponsored by the Asia-Pacific Regional preparatory committee and the Indonesian preparatory committee.
					 The ceremony discussed the issue related to the holding of the meeting, the issue of fixing the rounds of the meeting in order to regularize and further develop it as a festival praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu and erecting a monument to praising them in Mt. Paektu and the issue of conducting brisk solidarity activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people and of rendering sincere assistance to the campaign of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK as an immediate task.
					
					 At the ceremony Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and former Nepalese Prime Minister Madav Kumar Nepal were elected honorary chairmen of the international preparatory committee, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People who doubles as chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Socorro Gomes, president of the World Peace Council, Helmi El Hadidi, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, Peter Woods, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association  for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, Acilino Riveiro, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, and Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, its co-chairpersons.
					
					 An appeal to all progressive people in the world was made public at the ceremony.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Sends Appeal to World Progressives
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Sends Appeal to World Progressives
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The international preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu sent an appeal to all progressive people in the world on Oct. 6.
					The appeal said that the year 2017 marks the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK.
					
					 The international preparatory committee decided to hold the meeting, an international event of world progressives, in Mt. Paektu and Pyongyang in the DPRK in August next year associated with the exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the country's liberation and Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership feats, the appeal noted, and went on:
					
					1. Let us stir up the atmosphere of praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu through brisk celebration events worldwide for lauding their undying exploits on the significant holidays in 2017.
					
					Let us celebrate with splendor the birth anniversary of H.E. Kim Jong Un in January next year and conduct brisk colorful political and cultural activities till December marking the birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in the wake of the celebrations of the Day of the Shining Star and the Day of the Sun and thus make the whole year of 2017 clad in festive mood.
					
					2. Let us make the great feats performed by the great persons of Mt. Paektu always known to the whole world and glorify them for all ages.
					
					Let us highly praise the great ideology and leadership of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and their noble virtues and conduct positive activities for writing and creating books and literary and art works introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					3. Let us stage wide-ranging international solidarity activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					The international preparatory committee will creditably fulfill its responsibility and duty in ensuring international celebrations of significant year 2017 and making preparations for the successful holding of the meeting in close touch with the regional and national preparatory committees, the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in different countries and the international democratic bodies.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Inaugural Ceremony of Int'l Preparatory Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Inaugural Ceremony of Int'l Preparatory Committee
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the inaugural ceremony of the international preparatory committee for the Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on October 6.
					 The letter said to celebrate significant holidays in 2017 as auspicious events common to mankind is the unanimous aspiration and wishes of world progressives supporting the heroic Korean people and the DPRK.
					
					 Now six regional preparatory committees and 70 odd preparatory committees were organized worldwide and they conduct colorful activities, the letter noted, adding:
					
					 Today the international preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Indonesia, the country which President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il visited and which is the birthplace of the flower of the sun Kimilsungia.
					
					 Now the DPRK is making a long drive despite ceaseless challenges and threats from the hostile forces under the complex international situation. This is the brilliant fruition of politics of independence and Songun pursued by Kim Jong Un and the principle of giving priority to self-development.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that construction of a socialist power will be stepped up victoriously in Korea and the cause of global independence will steadily advance thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The international preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting for Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu will fulfill its responsibility and duty in conveying and glorifying long their greatness and exploits, the letter stressed.

articles.title: Congress of Red Cross Society of DPRK to Be Held
articles.content:
Congress of Red Cross Society of DPRK to Be Held
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Congress of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK will be held here on Oct. 18 and 19.
					 It will review the work conducted by the Red Cross Society to protect and promote the life and health of the people and its humanitarian activities during the period under review and discuss strategic plan, budget, etc. till 2020.
					
					 Colorful events will take place on the 70th anniversary of the Red Cross Society.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on Monday.
					 In the message the president extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the friendly Korean people on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea on behalf of the Syrian people and on his own behalf
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health, happiness and success and the Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 It expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two friendly peoples.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan Delegation
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from a Ugandan delegation for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Odauk Paul Michael, deputy commissioner of the National Secretariat for Patriotism Clubs Office of the President, on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in South Hwanghae Province
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju learned about farming in South Hwanghae Province.
					 He learned in detail about the farming in Yonan and Paechon Counties and encouraged the officials and agricultural workers in their drive to successfully complete the farming this year.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held on the spot to discuss issues of successfully harvesting crops and finishing threshing in the right time by keeping threshing machines in full-capacity operation.
					
					 The premier stressed the need to operate a field-responsibility-system within the framework of the sub-workteam management system and widely use effective farm machines. He instructed the relevant units to unconditionally provide electricity, materials and other things necessary for harvesting and threshing.
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round the Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Preparatory Committee Returns from Indonesia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Preparatory Committee Returns from Indonesia
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, led by Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as secretary general of the DPRK preparatory committee, returned home on Tuesday after participating in the inaugural ceremony of the international preparatory committee for the meeting held in Jakarta.

articles.title: Group of Cycling Journey for Reunification Leaves
articles.content:
Group of Cycling Journey for Reunification Leaves
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Departing here on Tuesday was the group of cycling journey for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for a joint meeting of the parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for the peace and the independent reunification of the Korean peninsula headed by Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China who doubles as co-vice-chairman of the Chinese preparatory committee.

articles.title: 10,000 Tons of Cement Transported to Disaster Areas Every Day
articles.content:
10,000 Tons of Cement Transported to Disaster Areas Every Day
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Chongjin Port and the Chongjin Railway Bureau of the DPRK have transported more than 10,000 tons of cement to the flood-hit North Hamgyong Province every day by raising their cargo and freight traffics 3-4 times.
					 The Chongjin Port boosted its discharging capacity through a work to raise the bucket capacity of wharf cranes more than 2.5 times and set up open storage grounds.
					
					 The Chongjin Railway Bureau conducted a work for hardening the railroad bed and renewing railroad ties to raise the strength of northern railways.

articles.title: Building Materials Production Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Building Materials Production Increases in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Industrial establishments in the DPRK launched a campaign for boosting the production of building materials to be sent to the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 The Sangwon Cement Complex sent at least 110 000 tons of cement to the disaster areas and the Sunchon Cement Complex carried out its production assignment at 76 percent on October 8.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex produced a great deal of bar steels and square bars in a short span of time.
					
					 Meanwhile, the production of such building materials as doors and windows was finished in the main.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Performance to Mark WPK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Performance to Mark WPK Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture Monday, the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, and other senior party and army officials, officials of the party and armed forces organs, those of the units associated with the leadership exploits and model units in the 200-day campaign of loyalty in Pyongyang, labor innovators, university students and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were prelude mixed chorus "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", orchestra and male chorus "We Will Always Take the Road of Loyalty", orchestra "Fly High, Our Party Flag" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung, founder and builder of the WPK, and leader Kim Jong Il and profound thanks of the service personnel and people to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and leading the cause of the Juche revolution started on Mt. Paektu to victory.
					
					 The audience were deeply impressed by the numbers dealing with the immutable truth that the party led by the great leader is great and the great party makes the people great and the country prosper.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Maze Completed at Rungna People's Pleasure Park
articles.content:
Maze Completed at Rungna People's Pleasure Park
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A maze has been recently built at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park in Pyongyang.
					 It covers 990 square meters with manifold hedges and structures, 10-odd open routes and closed sections.
					
					 Cameras, speakers and tens of lightings are installed there to offer conveniences to the visitors.
					
					 According to Ri Kwang Ho, chief engineer of the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, the maze took its shape under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japanese Reactionaries against Their Moves for Staging Comeback to Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japanese Reactionaries against Their Moves for Staging Comeback to Korea
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities recently signed an amendment to the agreement on mutual provision of goods and manpower the keynote of which is to provide munitions to the U.S. forces even in case they are not attacked by outside forces. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this a revelation of the Japanese reactionaries' criminal scenario to realize their overseas aggression by zealously pursuing the U.S. strategy to dominate the world. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to join in a war of aggression to dominate the world by throwing away the label of a war criminal state under the zealous patronage of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is the primary target of their aggression. Japan is seeking to invade Korea as it did in the last century and advance into the continent with it as a springboard.
					
					 But, this is no more than a daydream. The DPRK has a strong military muscle capable of beating back any aggression by a single strike.
					
					 There's no problem for our revolutionary armed forces to strike Japan as they keep even the U.S. mainland within their sight.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, not only those who do harm to us but those who back the aggressors will not be able to go scot-free.
					
					 The Japanese authorities would be well advised to ponder over the ensuing consequences and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Anti-DPRK Vituperation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Anti-DPRK Vituperation
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, south Korean puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An in his "commemoration address" foolishly cried out for "deterring nuclear provocation" with "firm will", while trumpeting about "strong defence capability" to cope with "the nuclear threat from the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this a revelation of the puppet group's sinister intention to pass the buck for escalating tension on the Korean peninsula to the DPRK, justify their confrontation racket and intensify their campaign to stifle it under the pretext of "deterring provocation".
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors that are threatening peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Hwang Kyo An made much fuss over the "nuclear threat from the north" and the like while pretending ignorance of their reckless moves to ignite a war. This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 Irony is that Hwang who knows nothing about military affairs dared challenge the DPRK with such nonsensical talks as "strong defence capability" and "firm will."
					
					 We would like to warn the Park Geun Hye group once again they had better properly understand their position and stop futile confrontation racket.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army equipped with nuclear deterrent to annihilate the enemy is fully ready to go into action and following with vigilance the reckless provocations of the U.S. and the puppet warmongers. 
					
					 The DPRK had already declared that the only way for the enemies to escape the deadly strikes is to refrain from infringing upon the dignity and security of the DPRK with prudence and self-control. 
					
					 The puppet forces would be well advised to heed the DPRK's warning and stop acting rashly.

articles.title: Resignation of S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister Demanded
articles.content:
Resignation of S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister Demanded
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Ministry of Defense on Oct. 6 demanding the resignation of the puppet defense minister, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 At the press conference, the speakers accused the minister of spouting a litany of such invectives as "scorched-earth operation against Pyongyang" at the inspection of the state administration at the "National Assembly".
					
					 His reckless remarks only deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and escalate the military tension, they noted, adding that what the people desire is peace on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 They strongly demanded the resignation of the defence minister keen to drive the people into shambles of war.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Late Paek Nam Gi Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Late Paek Nam Gi Held in Seoul
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Actions for Paek Nam Gi in south Korea held a memorial service for peasant Paek Nam Gi in Seoul on Oct. 8, according to the south Korean paper Korea Economic Daily.
					 The event was attended by more than 3 000 members of the organization and citizens.
					
					 They declared that the attempts of the prosecution and police to make an autopsy of the body of Paek killed by the water cannon of the fascist police amounted to violence. 
					
					 They demanded that the mastermind of murder be punished and a due apology be made to the family members of the deceased. 
					
					 The participants in the event staged a demonstration in protest against the authorities' brutal crackdown.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists' Reconnaissance Planes Hell-Bent on Spying on DPRK' Major Objects
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists' Reconnaissance Planes Hell-Bent on Spying on DPRK' Major Objects
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists have gone reckless in the moves to spy on the DPRK's major objects including nuclear facilities by mobilizing a lot of latest-type reconnaissance planes, according to Munhwa Ilbo of south Korea.
					 An ultra modern reconnaissance plane E-8C to spy on the DPRK day and night flew over south Korea under the pretext of a joint military exercise with the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 Four EO-5Cs, improved version of RC-7 deployed in Phyongthaek, south Korea, are gathering information about the DPRK round the clock. 
					
					 The U.S. special reconnaissance plane RC-12N is carrying out a similar mission.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Party Congress Issued in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Party Congress Issued in Russia
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was published in booklet by the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia with due ceremony on October 7 to mark the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Tendra lugar el Congreso de la Cruz Roja de RPDC
articles.content:
Tendra lugar el Congreso de la Cruz Roja de RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar los dias 18 y 19 en esta capital el Congreso de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion, se balancearan las labores de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC, que protegio y mejoro la vida y la salud del pueblo durante el periodo de revision general y desarrollo en todas las regiones del pais las actividades humanitarias.
					
					Y se discutiran el plan estrategico y el presupuesto hasta el ano 2020 y otros asuntos.
					
					Tambien, se realizaran las diferentes actividades con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion.

articles.title: Nace comite preparatorio internacional para congreso de elogio a lideres coreanos
articles.content:
Nace comite preparatorio internacional para congreso de elogio a lideres coreanos
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo constituido el comite preparatorio internacional para el congreso de elogio a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu de 2017.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en Yakarta de Indonesia la ceremonia de constitucion en nombre comun del comite preparatorio regional de Asia-Pacifico y el comite preparatorio de Indonesia, para el congreso de elogio a los grandes hombres de monte Paektu de 2017.
					
					En la ocasion, se discutieron los problemas relativos a la realizacion del congreso, la definicion del orden del congreso para normalizarlo y desarrollarlo mas en el futuro como el festival de elogio a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, la construccion de la lapida de elogio a estos hombres en el monte Paektu, la efectuacion mas activa de las actividades solidarias con la justa causa del pueblo coreano y el ofrecimiento de las activas cooperaciones a la reconstruccion de la zona septentrional de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, damnificada por las inundaciones.
					
					En la ocasion, como presidentes honorarios de esta entidad naciente fueron elegidos Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Madav Kumar Nepal, ex premier de Nepal, y como copresidentes Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo, Socorro Gomez, presidente del Consejo Mundial de la Paz, Helmi El Hadidi, presidente de la Organizacion de Solidaridad de los Pueblos Afro-Asiatico, Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, presidenta del Comite de la Fundacion de Educacion Soekarno de Indonesia, Peter Woods, copresidente del Comite Regional de Asia-Pacifico de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Pacifica de Corea, Fumihiro Himori, presidente del Comite Japones de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea, Guy Dupre, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Franco-Coreana, V. A. Petrov, presidente de la Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Anders Kristensen, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Dinamarca-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Acilino Riveiro, presidente del Comite Brasileno en Memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Damian Ogbonna, presidente nacional del Partido Progresivo del Pueblo de Nigeria, y Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Egipto-Corea.
					
					Tambien, quedo publicado un llamamiento a los pueblos progresistas del mundo y se adopto una carta dirigida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Comite preparatorio internacional envia llamamiento a pueblos progresistas del mundo
articles.content:
Comite preparatorio internacional envia llamamiento a pueblos progresistas del mundo
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio internacional para el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017 envio el dia 6 un llamamiento a los pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					El documento senala como sigue:
					
					2017 es el ano significativo en que se cumplen el 105o aniversario de natalicio de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung, el 75o aniversario de nacimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il y el 5o aniversario de la eleccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un en el maximo cargo del Partido y el Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Se decidio a efectuar en el monte Paektu y Pyongyang de la RPDC el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017, gran reunion internacional de los pueblos progresistas del mundo, en agosto del proximo ano, mes en que transmiten las hazanas de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung acumuladas en la liberacion de la patria y las de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il en la direccion mediante el Songun.
					
					1. Aumentemos el ambiente del elogio a grandes hombres dinamizando las actividades festivas en la arena internacional con motivo de las fiestas jubilosas de 2017.
					
					Hagamos reinar el ambiente de festejo durante todo el ano siguiente celebrando con solemnidad el dia de nacimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un en enero del proximo ano y desarrollando con energia variadas actividades politico-culturales con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz y el Dia del Sol y hasta diciembre cuando se acogera el dia de nacimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					
					2. Transmitamos a todo el mundo y hagamos brillar de siglo en siglo las grandes hazanas de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu.
					
					Desarrollemos las actividades para escribir y crear los libros y las obras literarias y artisticas que alaban la grandeza de la idea y direccion y los nobles rasgos de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y dan a conocer y propagar la realidad de Corea.
					
					3. Despleguemos en escala mundial las actividades solidarias internacionales que apoyan la causa justa del pueblo coreano.
					
					El comite preparatorio internacional cumpliran su responsabilidad y deber en las actividades conmemorativas internacionales dedicadas al ano significativo 2017 y los preparativos para la realizacion exitosa del Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu, bajo el estrecho vinculo con los comites preparatorios regionales y de los paises, las entidades de amistad y solidaridad con el pueblo coreano en varios paises y las entidades democraticas internacionales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en ceremonia constitucional de comite preparatorio internacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en ceremonia constitucional de comite preparatorio internacional
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviaran el dia 6 los participantes en la ceremonia constitucional del comite preparatorio internacional para el congreso de elogio a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					La misiva senala que festejar solemnemente las efemerides significativas del ano 2017 como fiestas comunes de la humanidad deviene la unanime aspiracion y deseo del heroico pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo que respaldan a la RPDC.
					
					Quedaron constituidos en el ambito mundial mas de 70 comites preparatorios incluyendo los 6 regionales que desarrollan diversas actividades y hoy se organiza el comite preparatorio internacional para el congreso de elogio a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu de 2017, en Indonesia, pais visitado por Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il y lugar donde nacio la flor inmortal Kimilsungia, subraya.
					
					Destaca que aun en medio de las complicadas situaciones internacionales, la RPDC sale siempre victoriosa frustrando los desafios y amenazas incesantes de las fuerzas hostiles, gracias a la independencia, el Songun y el principio de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento, mantenidos por el Presidente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que gracias a la orientacion del Mariscal, en la RPDC se promovera victoriosamente la construccion de potencia socialista y se llevara a cabo la causa de verificacion de independencia del mundo.
					
					Concluye que el comite naciente cumplira con su responsabilidad y deber en transmitir y glorificar para siempre las nobles personalidades y las hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ambicion de nueva agresion de Japon contra Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ambicion de nueva agresion de Japon contra Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, las autoridades japonesas firmaron el proyecto de enmienda del convenio de ofrecimiento reciproco de materiales y manos de obra, segun el cual Japon puede suministrar municiones a las tropas norteamericanas aunque no sea atacado desde el exterior. 
					En un comentario individual de este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de expresion de ambicion criminal de realizar la agresion a ultramar a manera de sumarse a la estrategia norteamericana de hegemonia mundial, y continua:
					
					Hoy dia, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan lanzarse a la guerra de agresion para la hegemonia mundial liberandose con la ayuda activa de EE.UU. de las trabas correspondientes al pais criminal de guerra. 
					
					El primer blanco es Corea. Al igual que en el siglo pasado, Japon trata de agredirla primero y avanzar al continente usandola como trampolin. 
					
					Pero, esto es una ilusion vana. 
					
					La RPDC tiene gran poderio militar capaz de rechazar de un golpe cualquier invasion armada. 
					
					No es un problema atacar a Japon para las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC que tienen a su alcance de fuego hasta el territorio estadounidense mas alla del Oceano Pacifico. 
					
					Si se desata la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, no podran estar salvos los involucrados en el ataque ni sus ayudantes.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben actuar con prudencia reflexionando de las graves consecuencias de su intento criminal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparates anti-RPDC de Hwang Kyo An
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparates anti-RPDC de Hwang Kyo An
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, el premier titere surcoreano Hwang Kyo An pronuncio un "discurso conmemorativo" en que se refirio a la "perfecta capacidad de defensa" frente a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea" y juro "disuadir la provocacion nuclear con la voluntad rotunda".
					Esto es una expresion del siniestro intento de imputar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la responsabilidad de la agravacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana, justificar sus actos conflictivos y recrudecer la campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC bajo el rotulo de "frenar la provocacion".
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. y la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye son autores que amenazan la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y agravan la crisis de guerra nuclear.
					
					Sin embargo, Hwang pronuncio disparates como "amenaza nuclear del Norte" haciendo vista gorda de sus imprudentes actos para provocar la guerra. Esto es el climax de descaro.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que ese tipejo iletrado en asuntos militares se atrevio a desafiar a la RPDC mencionando la "perfecta capacidad de defensa" y la "voluntad rotunda".
					
					Se exige una vez mas a la horda de Park Geun-hye que pare ahora mismo su inutil campana conflictiva conociendo bien su miserable situacion.
					
					El poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu con el disuasivo nuclear invencible y voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos observa con aguda vigilancia los actos provocadores de los belicistas de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea manteniendo la perfecta disposicion de combate.
					
					Ya hemos declarado a los enemigos que el unico remedio para evitar el golpe demoledor es controlarse sin atentar contra nuestra dignidad y seguridad.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con juicio escuchando seriamente nuestra advertencia.
